summary: A woman gets caught up in an international diamond heist which pushes her close to a spy who is trying to save the world.
cast: Ziyi Zhang|Leehom Wang|Terri Kwan|Ryan Zheng|Jack Kao|Chen Yao|Ruby Lin|Hua Liu|Ada Choi|Jin Zhang|Morris Hsiang Jung|Ji Wang|Brian Thomas Burrell|Singh Hartihan Bitto|Xingwen Jing|Scott Nankivel|Alfred Hsing
title: Fei chang xing yun
